amendment.description: To provide protections for postal workers with respect to their right not to subsidize union nonrepresentational activities.

action.text: Amendment SA 2046 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2046, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 81.
